name: tutor-mate
description: Companion plugin for tutor Starter Theme

scripts.bundle: mkdir -p ../tutormate-temp/tutormate && rsync -av --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='.git*' --exclude='.keep' --exclude='.eslintrc.json' --exclude='.eslintignore' --exclude='.gitattributes' --exclude='.github' --exclude='.gitignore' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='composer.json' --exclude='README.md' --exclude='phpcs.xml' --exclude='composer.lock' --exclude='mix-manifest.json' --exclude='assets/js/demo-importer.js.LICENSE.txt' --exclude='package-lock.json' --exclude='package.json' --exclude='webpack.mix.js' --exclude='sass' --exclude='react' ./ ../tutormate-temp/tutormate && cd ../tutormate-temp && zip -r ../tutormate.${npm_package_version}.zip tutormate && cd - && rm -rf ../tutormate-temp
scripts.build: composer i --no-dev && npm run prod && npm run makepot && npm run bundle

author: Themeum <hello@themeum.com> (https://themeum.com)
